title: OpenAI Releases GPT-5 with Native Reasoning Mode
excerpt: OpenAI has launched GPT-5, featuring a built-in chain-of-thought reasoning mode that can be toggled via API. Early benchmarks show a 40% improvement in math and coding tasks compared to GPT-4o.

title: Bun 2.0: Now with Full Windows Support and Compiled Binaries
excerpt: The fast JavaScript runtime Bun has reached version 2.0. This release brings stable performance on Windows and a new capability to compile TypeScript scripts into standalone executables.

title: GitHub Actions adds Managed GPU Runners for ML Workflows
excerpt: GitHub is making it easier to run large language models and other ML tasks by introducing managed GPU runners for Actions, eliminating the need for self-hosted infrastructure.

title: Critical RCE Found in Popular npm Package 'request-utils'
excerpt: A high-severity remote code execution vulnerability has been discovered in a utility package with over 2M weekly downloads. Users are urged to patch to v4.2.1 immediately.

title: Figma Variables: Advanced Logic and Theming Guide
excerpt: Deep dive into using Figma's newest variable types for complex UI state management, multi-mode theming, and automated design handoff workflows.

title: Cloudflare Workers Now Supports Python (Beta)
excerpt: Cloudflare has announced first-class support for Python in Workers, compiled to WebAssembly using the Pyodide runtime, enabling data science at the edge.
